title: The Herd-HOUR 1-College athletes, Lakers, MLB
itunes:title: The Herd-HOUR 1-College athletes, Lakers, MLB
description:
Colin talks about the safety of college athletes, what the Lakers need to win, and how MLB is handling Covid-19.


Guest: Bruce Feldman

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
